definition: conforming to the standards and conventions of the middle class
details:
adjective
- conforming to the standards and conventions of the middle class
= synonyms: bourgeois
- a noticeable focus on and/or admiration for consumer goods, particularly expensive luxury items, or wealth in general
= example: a noticeable focus on and/or admiration for consumer goods, particularly expensive luxury items, or wealth in general
= synonyms: mercenary, worldly-minded
